News.Title: New Opening Hours
News.Author: Admin
News.ShortText: The opening hours are slightly changed starting from 01.08.2018
News.LongText: The opening hours are slightly changed starting from 01.08.2018. Starting from 01.08.2018 our restaurant will be open from 12:00-15:00 and 17:00 - 22:00 during weekends.
